about_the_game:
Overview

Welcome to "Over Clock"! In this innovative puzzle game, explore the unknown underground world. Players place falling blocks to complete lines, advancing through stages and aiming for the 100th line. Each cleared line takes you deeper into the earth, discovering new challenges and materials along the way!

Features

Diverse Terrains: Water, forests, volcanoes, ice, and more - each block represents different terrains. Skillfully manage these blocks to unravel the mysteries of the underground.
Material Collection and Skill Development: Collect materials from cleared blocks to unlock new skills and upgrades. As the game progresses, so does the player’s strategy.
Challenging Puzzle Mechanics: More than just stacking blocks, players must understand the characteristics of each terrain and think strategically about block placement.
Adventure Component: The journey to reach 100 lines is not just a puzzle game, but a grand adventure. Changing terrains in each stage keep the gameplay experience fresh and exciting.
Let me know if you need any adjustments or further customization!

name: Over Clock Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 750, 1 GB or Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 750, 1 GB or Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: "Over Clock" is an innovative adventure game that combines puzzles and exploration. Players place blocks and delve deep underground aiming for the 100th line. Experience different terrains in each stage, collect materials to develop new skills. Strategy and speed are the keys to success.
